docs.snippet: There will be no way for the Yankees’ Michael Pineda to sidestep what lies ahead, when he pitches against the Cubs, after a substance was spotted on his pitching hand in his last outing....
docs.lead_paragraph: There will be no way for the Yankees’ Michael Pineda to sidestep what lies ahead, when he pitches against the Cubs, after a substance was spotted on his pitching hand in his last outing.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Michael Pineda will undergo intense scrutiny in game against the Chicago Cubs due to mysterious substance spotted on his pitching hand during last outing, against the Boston Red Sox.

headline.main: Pineda Set to Face Unwanted Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Continuing Comeback, Pineda Will Face Scrutiny Over Substance

docs.snippet: After raving about Juan Lagares for weeks, the Mets placed him on the 15-day disabled list after he pulled his right hamstring running to first base Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: After raving about Juan Lagares for weeks, the Mets placed him on the 15-day disabled list after he pulled his right hamstring running to first base Monday.
docs.abstract: New York Mets place promising hitter Juan Lagares on 15-day disabled list after he pulls his right hamstring; Lagares has so far not locked up an everyday spot on team, despite marked improvement at the plate.

headline.main: Mets’ Lagares Takes Detour to the Disabled List
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Lagares Takes Detour to the Disabled List

docs.snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, scheduled to pitch Tuesday, will now pitch the day game Wednesday. Michael Pineda will start the night game for the Yankees....
docs.lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, scheduled to pitch Tuesday, will now pitch the day game Wednesday. Michael Pineda will start the night game for the Yankees.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees, following rainout, prepare for doubleheader against the Chicago Cubs in which they hope to showcase their two youngest pitchers, Masahiro Tanaka and Michael Pineda.

docs.snippet: Kirk Nieuwenhuis, called up from the minors before the game, had three hits and drove in three runs in a 9-0 romp....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kirk Nieuwenhuis, called up from the minors before the game, had three hits and drove in three runs in a 9-0 romp.

headline.main: Nieuwenhuis, in Season Debut, Powers Mets Over Diamondbacks
headline.print_headline: Nieuwenhuis, in Season Debut, Powers Mets Over Diamondbacks

docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; Giancarlo Stanton scores career-high with five runs batted in as Miami Marlins beat Washington Nationals, 11-2; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Stanton Collects Five R.B.I. As Marlins Rout Nationals
headline.print_headline: Stanton Collects Five R.B.I. as Marlins Rout Nationals
